xxl.core.util

Interface Decorator<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the decorated object.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMemoryManageableQueue, AutomaticCloseCursor, BoundedQueue, CMDFunction, CountingAggregationFunction, CountingComparator, CountingComparator, CountingFunction, CountingPredicate, CountingSweepArea, DecoratorAggregationFunction, DecoratorBag, DecoratorColumnMetaData, DecoratorComparator, DecoratorComparator, DecoratorContainer, DecoratorCursor, DecoratorFunction, DecoratorList, DecoratorPredicate, DecoratorQueue, DecoratorRawAccess, DecoratorResultSet, DecoratorSet, DecoratorSortedSet, DecoratorSweepArea, DefaultMemoryManageableSA, DistinctAggregationFunction, DistinctMetaDataAggregationFunction, DistinctQueue, For, FunctionMetaDataFunction, LeftBind, LoggingMetaDataCursor, MemoryManageableListQueue, MemoryManageableSA, MetaDataAggregationFunction, Not, PredicateMetaDataPredicate, RenamedColumnMetaData, RightBind, SeekMapperRawAccess, Swapper, TesterRawAccess, ThreadsafeQueue, UnmodifiableBag, UnmodifiableQueue, VirtualTable

    public interface Decorator<T>
    A marker interface for decorators additionally providing a method that returns the decorated objects (decoree).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getDecoree()
      Returns the decorated object (decoree).

    • Method Detail

      • getDecoree

        Returns the decorated object (decoree).
        Returns:
        the decorated object (decoree).
